title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 172.4 - Deposit of funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 172.4 - Deposit of funds

State Regulations

The board of education shall direct that the moneys
received from the conduct, operation or maintenance of any extraclassroom
activity be deposited with an official designated by the board of education, who in such event shall be the treasurer of such extraclassroom activity
fund. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
172.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
